subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: * ''{{w|Xiandai Hanyu Guifan Cidian}}'' ({{w2|zh|pref=《|现代汉语规范词典|suf=》}}) proscribes the use of the pronunciations {{m|cmn|fù}} and {{m|cmn|fǔ}}.
